name: The Others
description:
"Story of this game is under development" The Others is a first-person psychological, Sci-Fi, horror game about a Father who becomes part of a time loop, tries everything to get his daughter back when she disappear after a mysterious accident.

Gameplay and Features

- The game is set inside a huge house and the player will explore and solve puzzles in every twisted mysteries room.
- Immersive atmospheric horror with no jump scare loud sound.
- Uncover the story behind the accidents and paranormal activity inside the house.
- Searching for hidden clues.
- What are you welling to sacrifice to save what you love!


Credit to background track "The Run" goes to Kai Engel
